cause.description:
We Dream, a new beginning
Be apart of something bigger that us!
All cause funds are donated to THE MAASAI POWER AND EDUCATION PROJECT INC www.buildafricanschools.org
School Bismarck will give over 200 children in Africa a chance. Without education there's no hope. Let' bring hope. Let's start "A new beginning"
" the heart should be just as big as the mind ,if not bigger" Jesse K
www.joinwedream.org
1. Build Project School Bismarck in Africa
2. Film a full Documentary from start to finish
cause.mission: Raise funds to Build Project School Bismarck in Africa
cause.name: WE DREAM
